statements: SELECT * FROM movement_of_goods;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, product_name FROM movement_of_goods WHERE origin_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, shipping_cost FROM movement_of_goods WHERE destination_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, origin_location, destination_location, shipping_cost FROM movement_of_goods WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM movement_of_goods WHERE shipping_cost > 1000 ORDER BY destination_location, shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM movement_of_goods WHERE shipment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, shipping_cost FROM movement_of_goods WHERE origin_location='Warehouse A' AND destination_location='Customer B'
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS shipment_count FROM movement_of_goods GROUP BY product_name HAVING shipment_count > 10 ORDER BY shipment_count DESC
SELECT destination_location, AVG(shipping_cost) AS avg_shipping_cost FROM movement_of_goods GROUP BY destination_location ORDER BY avg_shipping_cost ASC
SELECT * FROM movement_of_goods WHERE product_name LIKE '%Ware%' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC
SELECT * FROM movements ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, source_location, destination_location FROM movements WHERE item_id = 'c28b0fae-63d6-4e69-b2b6-196a5daed09f';
SELECT * FROM movements WHERE source_location = 'Warehouse A' AND destination_location = 'Store B';
SELECT movement_id, movement_date FROM movements WHERE destination_location = 'Store C';
SELECT movement_id, source_location, destination_location FROM movements WHERE movement_date >= '2023-01-01' AND movement_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM movements WHERE source_location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT movement_id, item_id, movement_date FROM movements WHERE destination_location = 'Store B'
SELECT movement_id, source_location, destination_location FROM movements ORDER BY movement_date DESC
SELECT * FROM movements JOIN transportation_routes ON movements.source_location = transportation_routes.source_location
SELECT movement_id, item_id, destination_location FROM movements WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM goods;
SELECT name, quantity FROM goods ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_goods FROM goods GROUP BY location;
SELECT tracking_id, timestamp, location FROM tracking WHERE goods_id = 2;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance FROM routes WHERE cost < 100;
SELECT * FROM goods WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM goods WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT tracking.tracking_id, tracking.timestamp, routes.origin_location, routes.destination_location FROM tracking JOIN routes ON tracking.location = routes.origin_location;
SELECT goods.name, tracking.timestamp, routes.route_id FROM goods JOIN tracking ON goods.id = tracking.goods_id JOIN routes ON tracking.location = routes.origin_location;

SELECT goods.name, SUM(routes.distance) AS total_distance FROM goods JOIN tracking ON goods.id = tracking.goods_id JOIN routes ON tracking.location = routes.origin_location GROUP BY goods.name ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location_coordinates IS NOT NULL;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_coordinates FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_name ILIKE '%phone%';
SELECT * FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, r.start_location, r.end_location FROM products p JOIN shipments s ON p.product_id = s.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id JOIN routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, weight FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10 AND sender_id = 3;
SELECT transporter_name, vehicle_type FROM transporters WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY cost_per_km ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE route_time < 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 5
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 100 AND availability = TRUE
SELECT transporter_name, cost_per_km FROM transporters WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck'
